comment.p: 84 games can be built from the latest MAME ROM sets (Street Fighter Zero is not in MAME anymore and the QSound ROMs aren't in MAME either).
The Big Bird (QSound) ROMs come from ssf2 for the CPS2.

revision.comment: Fixed incorrect gfx ROMs in mbomberj (mb_gfx02.rom, mb_gfx04.rom) of the 'merged' dat.
Released dats for Callus v0.42 patch 2.4.
Released dats for Callus v0.42 patch 2.2.
Added updated versions of Pi's notes to the archives (no changes to the dats themselves).

Released dats for Callus v0.42 patch 2.1 (standard one plus the two space-saving variants).
Also changed the archiving dat to be consistent with the other two.
Released first public version of 'merged' dats created by Pi (v1.1).
Updated both dats to Callus95 Patch 2.
CMPro dat: Logiqx added new 'forcemerge' tag.
RomCenter dat released by Logiqx (matches CMPro dat).
CMPro dat released by Logiqx (75 games).
